channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: SEICLO
channel.desc: Cymal 10 - Uchafbwyntiau'r dydd o'r Tour de France. Stage 10 - The day's highlights from the Tour de France.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: It's My Shout
channel.desc: Rhaglen ddogfen yn dathlu angerdd ffyrnig a chyfeillgarwch band o ferched Cymraeg, i gyd dros 50 oed. Documentary celebrating the passion and camaraderie of an over-50 Welsh women's band.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Gronyn Gobaith
channel.desc: Stori ryfeddol arbrawf mwya'r byd yn CERN, lle mae ffisegwyr o Gymru yn allweddol. The remarkable story of the biggest physics experiment in the world, where Welsh scientists are key.
